td.a: Delmar families: If you would like additional information about nutrition support programs in Delaware or Maryland, please see the links below:
td.br:
• DE Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) https://dhss.delaware.gov/dhss/dss/foodstamps.html
• DE TANF Temporary Assistance for Needy Families https://dhss.delaware.gov/dhss/dss/tanf.html
• MD Food Supplement Program: http://dhs.maryland.gov/food-supplement-program/applying-for-the-food-supplement-program/
• MD Emergency Assistance Program: http://dhs.maryland.gov/weathering-tough-times/emergency-assistance/
• The DE Free and Reduced Lunch Application packet may be completed anytime during the school year. The link to the application is posted on our District website, under the tab, “Students and Parents,” “Food and Nutrition,” and “Parent Resources & Helpful Links:” https://assist.dhss.delaware.gov Completed PDF packets and appropriate documentation can be mailed to the attention of Wendy Shores, Delmar Middle/High School Child Nutrition Manager, 200 North 8th Street, Delmar, DE 19940.

td.a: Distance Learning Packets for April 6-24 are now available!!
td.br:
The same materials are online in Schoology courses if you have computer/internet access.
Middle School materials are located at the School Entrance.
High School materials are located at the District Entrance.
Packets are available from 8:30am to 5:00pm Monday thru Thursday.

Wildcat families:
Starting next Monday, April 6th, the Delmar Wellness Center will be available by telephone for counseling and medical consultation for students already registered with the Wellness Center. Students and parents can call the Wellness Center:
Monday through Friday
8:00 am to 3:00 pm
302-846-0303
Cindy Madden, MSN, CRNP
Wellness Center Nurse
Victoria Cromer
Administrative Assistant
Delmar Wellness Center
200 North 8th Street
Delmar, DE 19940

Please copy and paste the link below into Firefox or Chrome to access Schoology.
delmar.schoology.com (Do not use www or https in front of this link)
Student Username: student first name. student last name@delmar (ex. john.doe@delmar)
Password: Student I.D. #
If you or your child need help with MS/HS distance learning, please e-mail our local Delmar Help Desks:
General Help and Paper Packet Help Desk: delmardistlearn@delmar.k12.de.us
Technology/Schoology Help: Covid.TechSupport@delmar.k12.de.us

Your Wildcat school family understands that managing this very challenging environment of change and uncertainty will take some time. We, as educators, and parents ourselves, understand that this will be a learning experience for all of us, and we are all looking forward to learning how to re-connect and build a "new normal" right along with you.
Click the Blue Header Above for more information.

div.p:
Dear Parents and Students,
It is my honor to be your
Superintendent. I am proud of what
our students and teachers have
accomplished. It is my goal to
continually achieve higher
standards for this school..
